examples: The food looks good.
Good wine can make a meal.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
This information is as good as gold.
"Your guess is as good as mine."
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is satisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng thỏa mãn

examples: Other students followed her lead and boycotted lectures.
The lovers held each other close.
Other football stakeholders also got a share of the cake.
Join the other kids.
Share your thoughts with other people.
words.defineEn: being the one that is different, extra, or not included
words.defineVi: là cái khác, bổ sung hoặc không được bao gồm

examples: These reforms will produce little change.
This room gets very little sunshine.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
These discussions held little interest for Lucy.
words.defineEn: small or below average in amount, size, degree, etc.
words.defineVi: nhỏ hoặc dưới mức trung bình về số lượng, quy mô, mức độ, v.v.

examples: The team's new manager brings ten years' experience to the job.
The new loan takes the total debt to $100 000.
The new president takes office in January.
Fans have given the band's new song their seal of approval.
The organization called the new regulations a turning point in the campaign against smoking.
words.defineEn: recently built, invented, made, etc.
words.defineVi: được xây dựng, phát minh, chế tạo gần đây, v.v.

examples: Your presentation sounded great, honestly.
The finance minister's fall from grace gave his enemies great satisfaction.
To show great courage.
The pope himself had taken great umbrage at the book.
The baby has brought them great joy.
words.defineEn: large in degree, size, or quantity
words.defineVi: lớn về mức độ, kích thước, hoặc số lượng

examples: Everyone has different interests.
The figures tell a different story.
Actually, I wear several different hats.
He had a different perspective on the movie.
She studied different subjects in school, from math to history.
words.defineEn: not like another thing or person in form, quality, nature, etc.
words.defineVi: không giống sự vật, con người khác về hình thức, phẩm chất, bản chất, v.v.

examples: As a manager, I encourage my team to take responsibility for their mistakes and to show understanding and forgiveness towards their colleagues, knowing that to err is human, to forgive divine.
For the Chinese, dragons symbolize divine power, controlling the rain, rivers, sea, and all other bodies of water.
For Mahayana Buddhists, the Buddha was divine.
It was a divine disaster area.
He's like a divine being.
words.defineEn: like, from, or related to God or a god
words.defineVi: giống như, từ, hoặc liên quan đến Chúa hoặc một vị thần

examples: The big fellow keeps a fish shop near the post office.
The government makes a big thing out of public support.
His dedication and hard work played a big part in the company's success.
The conference attracted many big names in the tech industry.
We're talking big money.
words.defineEn: large or above average in size, amount, degree, etc.
words.defineVi: lớn hoặc trên mức trung bình về kích thước, số lượng, mức độ, v.v.

examples: Right, pin back your ears, everyone.
That extension is busy right now.
I want a dish of creamy mushroom bucatini with Parmesan right now.
Right by holding the candle to the devil.
After the traffic lights, turn right.
words.defineEn: based on facts or the truth
words.defineVi: dựa trên sự thật hoặc sự thật

examples: The two men reached the same conclusion.
The same thing happened to me.
All newspapers sang from the same song sheet.
Anyone in her shoes would have done the same thing.
The two chefs are not in the same league.
words.defineEn: like another thing or person in every way
words.defineVi: thích một thứ khác hoặc một người theo mọi cách

examples: Next add the flour.
The school semester starts next month.
Next year sees the centenary of Saint-Saëns' death.
The theatre company has several new productions in the pipeline for next season.
Our next class will take the form of a debate.
words.defineEn: coming immediately after a person or thing in time, place, or rank
words.defineVi: đến ngay sau một người hoặc vật trong thời gian, địa điểm, hoặc thứ hạng

examples: Three players got their marching orders last week.
Company profits took a tumble last year.
Our cat produced kittens last week.
A wonder lasts but nine days.
That marriage won't last.
words.defineEn: final; happening at the end or coming after all others in order or time
words.defineVi: cuối cùng; xảy ra ở cuối hoặc đến sau tất cả những người khác theo thứ tự hoặc thời gian

examples: The rich family owned a private jet.
The rich businessman owned multiple luxurious cars.
Mind your own business!
Water will always find its own level.
Many families own plots of land to grow food.
words.defineEn: used for showing that someone or something belongs to or is connected with a particular person or thing
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để hiển thị rằng ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó thuộc về hoặc được kết nối với một người hoặc vật cụ thể

examples: Jane sure ran a tight ship around here.
That player sure got the bird after he dropped the ball.
The boss sure aired his lungs when we lost another customer!
He felt sure about his answer during the exam.
You can be sure of that.
words.defineEn: feeling confident about something being correct or true
words.defineVi: cảm thấy tự tin về một cái gì đó là đúng hoặc đúng

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
The bad weather brought famine.
Don’t use bad language.
Bad manners will get you nowhere.
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is unsatisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng không thỏa mãn

examples: The book raises many important questions.
We mark important passages in a book with a pencil underline.
It's very important.
Important new laws are already in the pipeline.
Saving money for the future is really important.
words.defineEn: having a lot of value
words.defineVi: có nhiều giá trị

examples: The colorful bird flew high in the sky.
The prices at the luxury boutique were quite high.
Unfortunately, the price of short ribs can be quite high.
He had high expectations for the team's performance in the tournament.
They set high standards of customer service.
words.defineEn: having a relatively great vertical extent
words.defineVi: có một phạm vi dọc tương đối lớn

examples: Only a handful of the candidates were able to get through to the final stage of the interview process.
The hall will be able to let in more spectators.
Booksellers should easily be able to move this biography of Lincoln.
He was able to abstract valuable insights from the extensive research.
He was able to negotiate a healthily high salary for his new job.
words.defineEn: having the necessary skill, power, resources, etc. for doing something
words.defineVi: có kỹ năng cần thiết, sức mạnh, nguồn lực, vv để làm một cái gì đó

examples: My father is quite old now
This thankless IT support job is really getting old.
This old house gives me the willies.
The old man gave up the ghost.
The old man considered his granddaughter thoughtfully.
words.defineEn: of a particular or specified age
words.defineVi: của một độ tuổi cụ thể hoặc quy định

examples: Small cracks appeared in the wall.
That holiday cost me a small fortune.
This small restaurant is the best pound for pound in the city.
The whole may be smaller than the sum of its parts!
I gave a small donation.
words.defineEn: little or below average in size, amount, degree, etc.
words.defineVi: ít hoặc dưới mức trung bình về kích thước, số lượng, mức độ, v.v.

examples: The whole is sometime less than the sum of its parts.
The Siemens display goes the whole hog.
The center will serve the whole community.
The whole may be smaller than the sum of its parts!
The whole procedure is as easy as ABC.
words.defineEn: complete or including every part
words.defineVi: hoàn thành hoặc bao gồm mọi phần

examples: The horse took the first fence well.
Generally, the article reads very well.
The car holds the corners very well.
The glue is taking well.
In this grim little episode, few people come out well.
words.defineEn: healthy or in good health; recovered from illness
words.defineVi: khỏe mạnh hoặc sức khỏe tốt; khỏi bệnh

examples: She wears her hair long.
This policy is no longer an effective means to an end.
Our players kept the pedal to the metal all season long.
The kids are under my feet all day long.
North Korea’s refusal had long been a sticking point.
words.defineEn: (of two points) having an above-average or big distance between them
words.defineVi: (của hai điểm) có khoảng cách trên trung bình hoặc lớn giữa chúng

examples: The garden looks nice.
The soft carpet feels nice under my feet.
The children were nice as pie.
This room would make a nice office.
The spicy sausage and mushroom fusilli had a nice kick of flavor.
words.defineEn: providing pleasure and enjoyment
words.defineVi: cung cấp niềm vui và hưởng thụ

examples: Get real!
Get real!
Is your jacket real leather?
Her last book was a real money-spinner.
You are a real grouch.
words.defineEn: happening or being in the world and not on someone's mind
words.defineVi: xảy ra hoặc tồn tại trên thế giới và không có trong tâm trí của ai đó
